amendment.description: To provide additional suppression resources to the Forest Service and the Department of the Interior for the protection of communities, homes, water supplies, utility infrastructure, and natural resources from catastrophic wildfires.

vote.text: Amendment SA 239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 239 proposed by Senator Udall CO.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 239 proposed by Senator Udall CO.
